quote: A dead man is the worst enemy alive, I thought. You can't alter his power over you. You can't alter what you love or owe. And it's too late to ask him for his absolution. He has beaten you all ways.
quote_letters: A DEAD MAN IS THE WORST ENEMY ALIVE I THOUGHT YOU CANT ALTER HIS POWER OVER YOU YOU CANT ALTER WHAT YOU LOVE OR OWE AND ITS TOO LATE TO ASK HIM FOR HIS ABSOLUTION HE HAS BEATEN YOU ALL WAYS
